title: Can Trump Make a Comeback? | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Aaron Watson | 1/22/21
description:
Glenn starts the show off with Bill O’Reilly, who gives his take on the many events of the past week: Whose approval is President Biden really seeking with all the executive orders? Is Obama back? Can Trump make a comeback, and would it be with the GOP? Polish Parliament member Sebastian Kaleta joins to discuss the dangers of Big Tech censorship and shares what Poland is doing to curb social media tyranny. Sen. Joe Manchin (D-W.V.) is already setting up how he’ll flip on the filibuster. The Left wants a monopoly on social media and an even further-cemented deep state. Country music artist Aaron Watson joins to discuss how his music career is dealing with the pandemic and his new album, “American Soul” — available now!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
